func:
const input = msg.payload
var chatId = input.chatId

msg.payload = {}
msg.payload.chatId = chatId
msg.payload.type = "message"
msg.payload.content = "Hello, \nWelcome to the SmartHome Remote Control Major Project, made by Nguyễn Phan Đức Anh - 20521071 and Trần Thị Quế Chi - 20521132. \nAccess Dashboard: http://34.125.252.87:1880/ui/"
return msg;
